issue.title: path::operator+= is defined, but not operator+

discussion.p: This doesn't seem to be in Boost.Filesystem, so maybe it isn't needed, but since path += path2 works then it seems reasonable to expect path1 + path2 to work as well.

blockquote.p: The 12 overloads required by basic_string operator+ scared me off, and I never came back to the issue.
